CustomField.description: This is the change request that this issue was created from or is attached to. It is filled in when a process issue is created to identify something that needs to be resolved or investigated or when a process issue is attached to a change request. Originating process issues (ie those that are converted into change requests) are tracked in the Originating Change Request field.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This is the change request associated with the issue.
CustomField.label: Parent Change Request
